name: Select.Item

label.description: The label of the select item, which is displayed in the menu.
label.description_zh: 菜单中显示的所选项目的标签。

value.description: The value of the select item.

disabled.description: Whether or not the select item is disabled. This will prevent interaction/selection.
disabled.description_zh: 是否禁用所选项目。这将阻止交互/选择。

asChild.description: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.
asChild.description_zh: 是否对此组件使用渲染委派。

el.description: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.
el.description_zh: 正在呈现的基础 DOM 元素。您可以绑定到此元素以编程方式与元素进行交互。

description: A select item, which must be a child of the Select.Content component.

slots.name: isSelected
slots.description: Whether or not the item is selected.

slots.name: builder
slots.description: The builder attributes and actions to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.
slots.description_zh: 如果使用带有委托的 asChild 属性，则要应用于元素的构建器属性和操作。
